festejo.1: Color: Violet - Wednesday of Holy Week
Color: White - Holy Thursday (Mass of the Lord's Supper)
Color: Red - Good Friday (Passion of the Lord)
Color: White - Holy Saturday (Easter Vigil)
(Solemnity) - Color: White - Easter Sunday of the Resurrection of the Lord
(Solemnity) - Color: White - Monday within the Octave of Easter
(Solemnity) - Color: White - Tuesday within the Octave of Easter
(Solemnity) - Color: White - Wednesday within the Octave of Easter
(Solemnity) - Color: White - Thursday within the Octave of Easter
(Solemnity) - Color: White - Friday within the Octave of Easter
(Solemnity) - Color: White - Saturday within the Octave of Easter
(Solemnity) - Color: White - II Sunday of Easter (or Sunday of Divine Mercy)
Color: White - Monday of the II Week of Easter
festejo.2: (Optional Memorial) - Color: Red - Saint Martin I, pope and martyr

festejo.1: Color: White - Tuesday of the II Week of Easter
Color: White - Wednesday of the II Week of Easter
Color: White - Thursday of the II Week of Easter
Color: White - Friday of the II Week of Easter
Color: White - Saturday of the II Week of Easter
Color: White - III Sunday of Easter
Color: White - Monday of the III Week of Easter
Color: White - Tuesday of the III Week of Easter
festejo.2: (Optional Memorial) - Color: White - Saint Anselm, bishop and doctor of the Church

festejo.1: Color: White - Wednesday of the III Week of Easter
Color: White - Thursday of the III Week of Easter
festejo.2: (Optional Memorial) - Color: Red - Saint George, martyr
festejo.3: (Optional Memorial) - Color: Red - Saint Adalbert, bishop and martyr

festejo.1: Color: White - Friday of the III Week of Easter
festejo.2: (Optional Memorial) - Color: White - Saint Fidelis of Sigmaringen, priest and martyr

festejo.1: (Feast) - Color: Red - Saint Mark, evangelist
Color: White - IV Sunday of Easter
Color: White - Monday of the IV Week of Easter
Color: White - Tuesday of the IV Week of Easter
festejo.2: (Optional Memorial) - Color: White - Saint Peter Chanel, priest and martyr
festejo.3: (Optional Memorial) - Color: White - Saint Louis Mary Grignion de Montfort, priest

festejo.1: (Obligatory Memorial) - Color: White - Saint Catherine of Siena, virgin and doctor of the Church
Color: White - Thursday of the IV Week of Easter
festejo.2: (Optional Memorial) - Color: White - Saint Pius V, pope
